message.content:
cs.CV, cs.RO, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CL

This paper deals with object recognition in human-centric environments, which is a common problem in robotics. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.RO (Robotics and Automation). The paper proposes an approach that uses visual topics and category-specific dictionaries for object recognition, which is a common technique in computer vision and machine learning. Therefore, the paper is also likely to belong to cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). The approach is unsupervised, which is a common theme in artificial intelligence, so cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) is also a possible sub-category. Finally, the paper uses natural language processing techniques to analyze the results, which suggests that it could also belong to cs.CL (Computation and Language).
